# url

**Instance Property**

The URL of the file for this attachment.

## Declaration

```swift
var url: URL { get }
```

## Discussion

The file at the specified URL is security scoped to your app. Before you access it, call the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/URL/startAccessingSecurityScopedResource()] method of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSURL].

## Getting the Attachment Contents

- **identifier**: The unique identifier for the attachment.
- **type**: The UTI type of the attachment.
